channel.title: Fitting Ammo Boxes to my Himalayan :: Digital Dilemma
channel.description: Who wants to pay £500 for the official panniers? Not me! Perhaps not to everyone’s taste, but ammo boxes are cheap, strong and last forever. They’re easy to fit, too! Backstory I like to carry a few things when I’m riding. Tools, a can of tyre weld, a spare litre of fuel, a couple of cereal bars and, being English, a flask of tea. So luggage was always something I needed. However, the official RE Panniers are surprisingly expensive, so originally I fitted two £10 military surplus kit bags like so:
